statements.chinese: 他需要保持练习来提升他的技术
statements.english: he needs to keep practicing to improve his skills

statements.chinese: 你保持练习那么你将会掌握那个技术
statements.english: you keep practicing and you will master the skill

statements.chinese: 保持练习那么你将会掌握那个技术
statements.english: keep practicing and you will master the skill

statements.chinese: 她一直学习新的技术来提升她自己
statements.english: she keeps learning new skills to improve herself
to forget to lock the door
she keeps forgetting to lock the door
she keeps forgetting to lock the door

statements.chinese: 她总是忘记锁门当她离开的时候
statements.english: she keeps forgetting to lock the door when she leaves
to forget his keys at home

statements.chinese: 忘记他的钥匙在家里(ing形式)
他总是忘记他的钥匙在家里
statements.english: he keeps forgetting his keys at home

statements.chinese: 他(一直)总是改变他的想法
statements.english: he keeps changing his mind all the time

statements.chinese: 我不介意打开这个窗户
statements.english: I don't mind opening the window
he doesn't mind paying the bill

statements.chinese: 和他的朋友们分享他的玩具
statements.english: to share his toys with his friends

statements.chinese: 和他的朋友们分享他的玩具（ing 形式）
statements.english: sharing his toys with his friends

statements.chinese: 他介意和他的朋友们分享他的玩具
statements.english: he minds sharing his toys with his friends

statements.chinese: 他不介意和他的朋友们分享他的玩具
statements.english: he doesn't mind sharing his toys with his friends
to share his food with others

statements.chinese: 和别人分享他的食物(ing形式)
他不介意和别人分享他的食物
statements.english: he doesn't mind sharing his food with others
to wait for her at the airport
waiting for her at the airport
he doesn't mind waiting for her at the airport

statements.chinese: 和任何人分享他们的秘密
statements.english: to share their secrets with anyone

statements.chinese: 和任何人分享他们的秘密(ing形式)
他们不介意和任何人分享他们的秘密
statements.english: they don't mind sharing their secrets with anyone

statements.chinese: 关于这个问题的一些建议
给我关于这个问题的一些建议
statements.english: to give me some advice about this problem

statements.chinese: 给我关于这个问题的一些建议（ing 形式）
statements.english: giving me some advice about this problem

statements.chinese: 他不介意给我关于这个问题的一些建议
